entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.5°C

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low zero with patchy frost.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
